title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง 21.1 - Original applications and examinations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง 21.1 - Original applications and examinations

State Regulations
(a) The forms of applications for original licenses to act as an insurance broker for life insurance pursuant to section
2104 (b)(1)(A)
of the Insurance Law, as an insurance broker for all other kinds of insurance pursuant to section
2104 (b)(1)(B)
of the Insurance Law and as an excess line broker pursuant to section
2105
of the Insurance Law are hereby prescribed as follows: individuals; partnerships; corporations; limited liability companies. These forms may be obtained upon request to the Insurance Department, Albany, NY. The term original application as used in this Part means an application for an insurance broker's or excess line broker's initial license. (b) A separate examination shall be taken and passed by each individual seeking to be a licensee or a sublicensee pursuant to section
2104 (b)(1)(A)
or pursuant to section
2104 (b)(1)(B)
of the Insurance Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง
21.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
